dataset.title: Phytoplankton abundance at 2 lagoons in Doñana LTSER Platform (2011-2012)

section.para: Monthly abundance of dominant phytoplankton species at 2 permanent phreatic lagoons representing in Doñana.

section.title: Dataset access and use constraints
section.para: Principal:Public has granted a permission of type:Free for access and use upon request
Co-authorship on publications resulting from use of the dataset

para.literalLayout: Triplicated water samples fixed with formaldehyde (4% V/V) in situ. Ssp identification with inverted optical microscope with epifluorescence (Olympus IX50). Counting of individual phytoplankton cells after filtering 0.1 ml through black Isopore membrane filters GTBP with a 0.2 μm pore size and washing the cells with citrate buffer (pH 6). Each filter was examined for the autofluorescence of cell pigments at 1000X. The measurements were made under microscope according to the method described by Fry (FRY, J. C. 1990. Direct methods and biomass estimation. Methods in Microbiology, 122: 41–85).
